answers.answer: Jus wanted to say sorry your having these headaches, i hope its nothing, good luck with your appt.
Thank you. I will update when I get home my appt isn't until 2pm. I am sure they will tell me this is "normal" lol.
Aww...sorry you aren't feeling well...headaches and such at this point in time are just a nusiance. I do hope you feel better soon.
I hope you get some relief soon and that it's nothing serious. Let us know how it goes! Praying for you.

Thank you ladies. I actually found out that my cervix is starting to dialate (barely); also that I have Bacterial Vaginosis...chalk another thing up I guess lol. The doctor gave me a prescription for vicodin to try to get rid of the headache but she also wants an MRI done this week to make sure that I didn't have a mini stroke or a blood clot. I'm keeping my fingers crossed that all is well.
Oh no! You poor thing. BV seems so common in pregnancy. I never actually heard about it until I got it. I am hoping all continues well with you!! hang in there girl.

question: I've had this dang headache since Friday I've been taking tylenol for it (helps some) but the nausea is horrid. It was so bad this morning that it woke me up from a dead sleep at 2am. I called the clinic I go in at 2pm. I'm sure it's not preeclampsia...I've been paying attention to my BP since the headaches started. I think while I'm there I'm going to see if I can get them to check my cervix and put my mind at ease with all the mucus discharge.
title: Headache and Nausea
